s = input()

if (len(s) % 2 == 0) and (s[0] in 'RUD') and (s[-1] in 'RUD'):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')



s = list(input().strip())

n = len(s)

odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]

if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens) or all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

n = int(input())

a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

b = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

c = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

ans = 0

prev = -1

for i in range(n):
    if prev + 1 == a[i]:
        ans += c[prev-1]
    ans += b[a[i]-1]
    prev = a[i]

print(ans)


s = list(input().rstrip())

n = len(s)

odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]

if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


import sys
import re

def main():
    s = sys.stdin.read()

    s = re.sub(r'[\n\r]', '', s)
    s = re.sub(r'[\s]{2,}', ' ', s)

    n = len(s)

    odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
    evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]

    if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
        print("Yes")
    else:
        print("No")

main()
